description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Basketball Trick Shot is a physics based game.  The goal is simple... put the ball in the basket.  Challenge yourself with the 20 pre-built levels or create your own levels for timeless fun!
description.short: Basketball Trick Shot is a physics based game.  The goal is simple... put the ball in the basket.  Challenge yourself with the 20 pre-built levels or create your own levels for timeless fun!
